# [Interview #619: WorldCon 2011 Reading - Linda Taglieri, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=619#4)

#### Brandon Sanderson

There will likely be glimpses of a Stormwarden in the
*Way of Kings*
interlude.
